attributes.action: Make parking in supermarket car parks cost as much as average parking costs in the nearest town centre
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to create a level playing field for small town centre businesses, especially food businesses.  Parking at supermarkets is free, why not make it cost as much as the average nearest town-centre parking?
Small town centre businesses need this to make the competition between them and the supermarkets more fair.

rejection.details: Supermarket parking charges are the responsibility of the supermarket companies, not the Government.
